Juanita du Plessis (née Naudé) bụ onye na-agụ egwu mba Afrikaans, a mụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na isii nke ọnwa Eprel na Windhoek, Namibia
A maara ya maka egwu ya bu Ska-Rumba
Ọrụ ịbụ abụ Du Plessis malitere n'afọ1998 na abọm mbụ ya bụ Juanita
N'afọ ahụ, o ritere ihe nrite CMA (Country Music Association in Namibia) dị ka onye ọbụ abụ kachasị mma, onye na-ede egwu kachasị mma na awọd nke Association maka ihe ịga nke ọma.
Nrepu Ahịa ndekọ ya karịrị puku atọ. N'afọ 2010, ọ natara ihe nrite South African Music na ngalaba Best Afrikaans DVD nke emume anuri afọ iri ya imepụta egwu kpọrọ ọkụ
DVD ahụ nwere egwu ya kachasị nwee ihe ịga nke ọma n'ime afọ iri mbụ nke ọrụ abụ ya

E tụnyere ya ugo onye kachasị ewu ewu na afọ nke asaa n'usoro na mmemme Huisgenoot's Tempo Awards na Johannesburg n'afọ 2011. N'afọ 2018, o mere emume afọ iri abụọ na ụlọ ọrụ egwu, na-ewepụta abọm kachasị nke 20 Jaar - Treffers van 2008–2018
Ọtụtụ abọm dị n'asusuAfrikaans ma a na-edebe  aha ndị a n'asụsụ mbụ.
Juanita lụrụ Herman du Plessis ma ha mụtara ụmụ atọ bụ: Ruan, Mario na Franja (abụọ ikpeazụ bụ ejima)

Nwanne ya nwoke, Pieter Naudé, bụkwa onye na-eme ihe omume na South Africa.
Nwa ya nwoke nke mbụ bụ Ruan bụkwa onye na-agụ egwu Afrikaans, na onye njikwa na Juanita Records

Ọ na-eme ihe nkiri nke oji aha Ruan Josh.
Nanị otu nwa ya nwanyị bụ Franja bụkwa onye na-agụ egwu Afrikaans nke ọma ma rite onyinye Ghoema abụọ n'afọ 2017.
